product_name: Patagonia Better Sweater Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Patagonia Better Sweater is a very soft, full-zip polyester jacket with a timeless sweater-knit face and the warmth and durability of 9.5 oz. polyester fleece. Made from polyester fleece, it dries quickly and adds torso warmth on its own for the shoulder seasons or layers nicely under a shell deep into winter. Resilient knit face resembles wool, and the plush fleece interior feels broken-in. Front zipper has tall collar, zipper garage and windflap to fight chilly gusts. Stretch jersey trim at cuffs and hem lends nice finish details. Patagonia Better Sweater jacket features zip handwarmer pockets. Raglan sleeves and a regular fit make the Patagonia Better Sweater easy to work and play in. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia.
short_description: The Patagonia Better Sweater is a very soft, full-zip polyester jacket with a timeless sweater-knit face and the warmth and durability of 9.5 oz. polyester fleece.
